permissions.see_country: Always display the country of the IP address

general.heading: General Settings
general.help: These settings control the general behavior of the extension.

providers.heading: IP Lookup Service
providers.help: Choose a service to use for IP lookups. Some services have rate limits, so be sure to check the service's documentation for more information.

settings.service_ipdata_description: Use https://ipdata.co to make up to 1,500 lookups daily for free. Paid plans for higher usage limits are also available.
settings.service_ipapi_description: Use http://ip-api.com to make up to 45 lookups per minute for free. If you make more, requests will be queued and looked up once the time window resets.
settings.service_ipapi-pro_description: Use https://members.ip-api.com/#pricing. Pro plan has unlimited usage.
settings.service_iplocation_description: Use https://www.iplocation.net/ to retrieve country and ISP data. Lookup rate limits are unknown.
settings.service_ipsevenex_description: Use https://7x.ax to get a free API key for up to 20 requests per minute. Paid plans for higher usage limits are also available.
settings.show_flag_label: Show country flag for each post
settings.show_flag_help: Without disclosing the IP address, show the country flag of the IP address of the post author, when the user opts in via their preferences.

map_modal.title: IP Information
map_modal.not_enough_data: Not enough data to draw a map

settings.ip_country: Show the flag of the country I post from, based on my IP address

settings.showIPCountry: Show the flag of the country the user posts from
settings.showIPCountry-help: This is based on their IP address at the time of posting. The country flag (if enabled) will be visible to all users. Admin users and moderators will see the IP address in the tooltip.
